author: Alan Gomez
description: The Santos-Trump meeting came as Colombia struggles to implement historic peace deal.
title: Colombian president, Trump push for crackdown on cocaine production

author: Jamiles Lartey
description: Trump held a joint press conference with Colombia’s president, Juan Manuel Santos, and took questions from reporters Thursday
title: Trump: Russia inquiry distracts from running the US 'really, really well' – live

author: FourFourTwo
description: Julen Lopetegui has made one or two surprise choices for his Spain squad for matches against Colombia and Macedonia.
title: Asensio, Deulofeu and Illarramendi named in Spain squad

author: Tracy Wilkinson, Chris Kraul
description: Colombia's leader wants considerable U.S. aid as his country emerges from a half-century of war.
title: Colombian President Santos goes to White House to seek aid guarantees

author: The New York Times
description: During a brief photo opportunity with President Juan Manuel Santos of Colombia, the president said he was “very close” to choosing a new F.B.I. director.
title: Trump Says He’s Close to Choosing F.B.I. Director

description: Trump sounds the alarm on Colombia's drug production. Output of coca, the raw material for making cocaine, soared to a record 188,000 hectares last year, according to U.S. government figures, from 78,000 hectares in 2012 when the peace talks started.
title: President Trump Holds Press Conference With Colombian President Santos

author: talkSPORT
description: Manchester United are set to win the race for Real Madrid and Colombia playmaker James Rodriguez, according to reports. The 25-year-old has been unsettled at the Bernabeu and he has continuously been linked with a move to Old Trafford. It has been reported a deal has been agreed and now it has emerged the move could be announced as early as Sunday.
title: Manchester United transfer news: James Rodriguez set to complete move from Real Madrid with confirmation imminent - reports

author: talkSPORT

title: Manchester United transfer news: James Rodriguez set to complete move from Real Madrid with confirmation imminent - reports
